name: Goodra
description: The Dragon Pokémon. This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from grass-type attacks. If hit by a grass type move, it takes no damage and instead absorbs the energy, granting advantage on its next attack.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by negative status ailments in water or during rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On a result of 3 or 4, the attacker's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn.
